name: Jumpy Juniki
description:
You are a monkey named Juniki and you are out of bananas so you have to go into the forest to get some

This was made for the 1-Button Game Jam 2022 by Feldo on itch.io #1buttonjam

https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam-2022

  • Monkey SFX by me 
  • Titlescreen SFX by me
  • Art by me
